overview: Take a trip into the mind of parapsychologist, cartoonist, and performance artist Tom Howell as he rallies collaborators to work on his new show, Hidden Planet, and prepare for its debut in Washington, D.C.
tagline: A surreal and psychedelic trip into the mind of parapsychologist, cartoonist, filmmaker, and performance artist Tom Howell.
title: Destined for Obscurity
